name: Sword of the Kesshonic Key
description:
Please enjoy this free magical item, a series of seven reliquaries, from the Heart of Arcana. 

This unique sword is an alleged reliquary containing a bone fragment of the ancient Archfey, Orvab the Handless within the amethyst crystal pommel. 

A relic coveted by the Forces of Darkness, this artifact is one of a supposed seven that many groups seek to unite in order to resurrect Him, and bring the world into an age of everlasting Evil.
